```{r source, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library(tidyverse)
   library(palmerpenguins)
   library(janitor)

   penguins_raw <- read_csv(path_to_file("penguins_raw.csv")) %>%
      clean_names()
      
   
```


```{r explore}

   library(skimr)

   skim (penguins_raw)
```


```{r transform}

   library (glue)
   
   penguins <- penguins_raw %>%

      mutate (
         study_sample = glue ("{study_name}-{sample_number}"),
         species = word (species, 1)
         ) %>%
      rename (
         bill_length = culmen_length_mm,
         bill_depth = culmen_depth_mm,
         flipper_length = flipper_length_mm,
         body_mass = body_mass_g
         ) %>%
      select (study_sample, species, island, bill_length, bill_depth, flipper_length, body_mass) %>%
      drop_na
```
